definition[0]: a document like a bill that is sent to the customer to show what a price would be if he or she made an order
definition[1]: an invoice sent to a customer asking for payment before goods are sent, often done when the buyer is a new customer
example[0]: The supplier may issue a payment request note or a pro forma invoice.
definition[2]: an invoice sent to a possible buyer as an example of prices etc of different goods
example[1]: Dealer inquiries welcome - discount rates and pro forma invoices on request.
